testcase.classname: To validate the account creation of Amazon application
testcase.name: To create a new account
testcase.system-out: Given To launch the browser and maximize the window.........................passed When To launch url of amazon application....................................passed And To click the signin button..............................................passed And To click the create new account.........................................passed And To pass the firstname in the name textbox...............................passed And To pass the mobileno or email in the email textbox......................passed And To create new password using new password textbox.......................passed Then To close the Chrome browser............................................passed
